attributes.action: Reverse the decision to block the Gender Recognition Reform (Scotland) Bill
attributes.background: I want the Government to reverse their decision to block the Gender Recognition Reform (Scotland) Bill, as this legislation contains important provisions for the LGBT community in Scotland. We are a United Kingdom, and the UK Government should not block devolved legislation.

departments.name: Office of the Secretary of State for Scotland
